CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NextDecade Corp is a development and management company. It primarily focuses on land-based and floating LNG projects, creating opportunities in the global integrated natural gas industry. NextDecade provides a number of services depending on the individual needs of the customer.
